title: DYLN Protective Silicone X-Small Bottom Guard for 21 & 16 oz DYLN Standard Mouth Alkaline Water Bottles | Anti-Slip & Flexible Boot | Doubles as a Pet Dog Bowl | Galaxy Blue
features: PROTECT YOUR DYLN BOTTLE: The high-quality food-grade silicone boot helps protect against dents, scratches, and damage from daily use. The flexible & durable Bottom Guard provides maximum protection for your 16 oz or 21 oz DYLN Standard Mouth Water Bottles. Mix and match colors to make your bottle uniquely yours.

COMPATIBLE WITH THE 16 OZ & 21 OZ DYLN BOTTLES: The X-Small Bottom Guards are only compatible with the 16 oz & 21 oz Standard Mouth DYLN Bottles. The 32 oz Wide Mouth DYLN Bottle is compatible with the Medium Bottom Guard and the 40 oz Wide Mouth DYLN Bottle is compatible with the Large Bottom Guard.

DOUBLES AS A PET & DOG BOWL: The Silicone Bottom Guard can be used as a portable water or food bowls for pets. Make sure your furry friends stay hydrated on your walks and hikes with refreshing alkaline water from your DYLN Water Bottle.
GIVE YOUR BOTTLE A LONGER LIFE: The Bottom Guard helps to avoid your bottle being knocked down accidentally. No more worrying about accidental bottle dropping.

MUST HAVE FOR YOUR BOTTLES: Avoid noises when placing your DYLN Bottle on hard surfaces as the flexible silicone makes for a soft and easy landing. Prevent scratches, dings, or dents with this extra layer of protection during indoor adventures, extending the life of your bottle. It's the DYLN Bottle accessory for outdoor activities and your active lifestyle.
description: The DYLN X-Small Bottom Guard, which is made from flexible food-grade silicone, adds an extra layer of protection against bumps and dents to your DYLN Bottle. The Bottom Guard also doubles as a dog bowl, so when you are out on a walk or hike your furry friends can stay hydrated with refreshing alkaline water from your DYLN Bottle. The X-Small Bottom Guard is compatible with Standard Mouth 16 oz and 21 oz DYLN Water Bottle. It is not compatible with the 32 oz or 40 oz DYLN Bottles. The simple but effective design fits snug against your bottle, cushioning it from drops and slippage. Whether itâ€™s the damage from a drop or the noisy sounds of placing your bottle on a hard surface, the Bottom Guard muffles noise while keeping the exterior safe.
